definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: "An onion adventure" will lead the children into the the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《洋葱头历险记》会带领孩子走进这个奇妙的世界。

sentences.english: I like to eat a pizza with onions.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃有葱头的比萨。

sentences.english: If you salt the vegetables with a little onion salt, they will taste better.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在蔬菜里加点葱头盐，就会更好吃一些。

sentences.english: Skin carrot and cut in to pieces. Skin shallots.
sentences.chinese: 红萝卜去皮切块，红葱头去皮保持原粒。

sentences.english: Princess first took over the boy's tissue, is the onion guy.
sentences.chinese: 健忘公主第一次接过男生滴纸巾，就是葱头的。

sentences.english: Add the morels and shallots and sweat until soft, about 3 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 加入羊肚菌和红葱头，加热使之变软，约3分钟。

sentences.english: What's the difference between a viola and an onion?
sentences.chinese: 中提和洋葱头的区别是什么？

sentences.english: There is. too much onion in the salad.
There is too much onion in the salad.
sentences.chinese: 洋葱头甚至可以使遗产继承人或寡妇也哭起来。

sentences.english: Gravlax, Egg, Capers, Shallots, Horseradish Cream.
sentences.chinese: 腌制三文鱼，鸡蛋，酸豆，红葱头，辣根奶油。

sentences.english: He peeled away the outer layers of the onion.
sentences.chinese: 他把洋葱头外面的皮剥了下来。

sentences.english: Add the olive oil into the same pan, and stir in chopped garlic and shallot until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 锅里加入橄榄油，放入蒜末和红葱头末炒香。

sentences.english: Onions can make even heir and widow weep.
sentences.chinese: 洋葱头甚至可以使遗产继承人或寡妇也哭起来。

sentences.english: The onions made the cook's eyes water.
sentences.chinese: 洋葱头刺激得厨师两眼流泪。

definition: same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
